line_2: Your sage advice in this to follow.

line_1: The groups that press to give th' "Apollo"
line_2: A parting glance, he scorns to follow;

line_1: IF e'er in thy sight I found favour, Apollo,
line_2: Defend me from all the disasters which follow:

line_1: Name but the suppers in th' Apollo,
Your Gods are Cupid and Apollo;
line_2: Nor Pallas you, nor Mars shou'd follow;

line_1: Which I am order'd by Apollo,
line_2: To shew you in the Words that follow.
These Rites are past: And now must follow
